'Nib/Ink' are customizations based on the Bootstrap 'Morph' theme, aiming for a minimal, elegant, and book-like reading experience.

## Features

- **Book-like reading experience** - used Google Fonts Noto Serif/Noto Serif SC (body) and Fira Code (code).
    
    - Can be used for both English and Simplified Chinese blogs.
    
- **Minimal distraction** - all unnecessary decorative elements are hidden.

- **Easy further customization** - change color scheme by simply editing the `/* Color Palette */` section.

- Supports dark themes and mobile browsers.

![Preview](preview.jpeg)

## Download/Tutorial

[nib.scss](nib.scss)

[ink.scss](ink.scss)

To use this theme in Quarto, download the files above and add the following configuration to `_quarto.yml`:

```yaml
format:
  html:
    theme:
      light: 
        - morph
        - nib.scss
      dark: 
        - morph
        - ink.scss
```

To customize color schemes, paste 6-digit HEX codes in corresponding places:

```css
/* Color Palette */
$body-bg: #f4f4f4;
$body-color: #222222;
$link-color: #635d5d;
$link-hover-color: #9f3838;
$code-color: #222222;
$code-bg: #e7e7e7;
$code-block-bg: $code-bg;
```
